mapper.select: SELECT T1.ad_detail_category AS adDetailCategory ,T1.media_title AS mediaTitle ,T1.media_summary AS mediaSummary ,T1.media_detail_explain AS mediaDetailExplain ,T1.thumbnail_img_nm AS thumbnailImgNm ,T1.thumbnail_origin_file_nm AS thumbnailOriginFileNm ,T1.thumbnail_img_file_path AS thumbnailImgFilePath ,T1.media_price AS mediaPrice ,T2.media_introduce AS mediaIntroduce ,T2.region AS region ,T2.ad_category AS adCategory ,T3.nickname AS nickname ,T3.email AS email ,T3.user_order AS userOrder FROM adin_media_register T1 LEFT JOIN adin_media_introduce T2 ON T1.email = T2.email LEFT JOIN adin_user T3 ON T1.email = T3.email WHERE 1=1 AND T1.media_order = #{mediaOrder};

SELECT portfolio_order AS portfolioOrder ,email AS email ,portfolio_title AS portfolioTitle ,portfolio_ad_detail_category AS portfolioAdDetailCategory ,portfolio_ad_category AS portfolioAdCategory ,portfolio_region AS portfolioRegion ,main_img_nm AS mainImgNm ,main_origin_file_nm AS mainOriginFileNm ,main_img_file_path AS mainImgFilePath ,create_dt AS createDt ,modify_dt AS modifyDt FROM adin_portfolio WHERE 1=1 AND email = #{email} LIMIT 0, 10;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM adin_portfolio WHERE 1=1 AND email = #{email};
